title: US 67 Dallas photos

pageHeader.title: Driving Views
pageHeader.lastUpdated: February 1, 2018 (update captions for the start of the Southern Gateway project)

text: 2018 status: In 2018 the $666 million Southern Gateway project began, which will widen the freeway. All the photos shown from I-35E to Belt Line will are obsolete and retained as a historical archive.

images.caption: Going southbound on I-35E, this is the split for US 67. The first 4.2 miles going southbound, to Camp Wisdom, opened on July 29, 1969. The HOV lane was added March 11, 2002.

imageStatus.note: The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2021.

images.caption: Access to the HOV lane is just ahead.

imageStatus.note: The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.
The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.
The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.
The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.

images.caption: The main runway for Dallas Executive Airport is just to the right, which is why the center lights are truncated to be lower than normal.

imageStatus.note: The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.

images.caption: The onramp at Red Bird road.

imageStatus.note: The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.

images.caption: The interchange with Interstate 20 is just ahead.

imageStatus.note: The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.

images.caption: This interchange was completed on July 12, 1974.

imageStatus.note: The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.

images.caption: This is the onramp at Danieldale road in Duncanville.

imageStatus.note: The freeway will be widened and reconfigured by the Southern Gateway project, completion in 2022.

images.caption: At the exit for Belt Line
At the Gilco Road/Dove Lane exit
In Midlothian, with US 287 visible ahead. The US 67 freeway ends just past US 287 with a signalized intersection.
